name: Dusk (itch) (Paula Quinones)
description:
Esto es un sueño. ¿Donde estás? Creo que había algo que hacer... ¿Recuerdas? No... Mira las luces.

This is a dream. ¿Where are you? I think that there was something you had to do... Remember? No... Look at the lights.

This is a very early draft of the game.
